name: Jumping Together
description:
Twins' gravity is opposite, you have to get to the end by controlling them. Krin is green, but Klue is blue. They cannot be split. If they're too far from each other, you lose. No checkpoints for you, you failed, you lose. So be careful, and enjoy the game.

This game is made by a 14-year-old student. This is the first game he made using Unity.
